alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Routt County through 445 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Steamboat Springs, or 39 miles east of Craig, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Routt County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin
